name: raster-streamlines
description: Generates stramlines as a GeoJSON from a raster field

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -n rs -o build/raster-streamlines.js -- index.js
scripts.test: tape 'test/*-test.js' && mkdir -p test/output && test/compare-images && eslint index.js src
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/raster-streamlines.js -c -m -o build/raster-streamlines.min.js
